name: location
description: The locations where organizations operate. Locations may be virtual, and one organization may have many locations.

id.name: id
id.title: Identifier
id.description: The identifier of the location. Each location must have a unique identifier.

location_type.name: location_type
location_type.title: Location Type
location_type.description: The type of location, which may be either `physical`, `postal`, or `virtual`.

url.name: url
url.title: URL
url.description: If location_type is virtual, then this field represents the URL of a virtual location.

organization_id.name: organization_id
organization_id.title: Organization Identifier
organization_id.description: The organization identifier for a location. This is the organization that is responsible for maintaining information about this location. The identifier of the organization should be given here. Details of the services the organization delivers at this location should be provided in the services_at_location table.

alternate_name.name: alternate_name
alternate_name.title: Alternate Name
alternate_name.description: An (optional) alternative name of the location.

description.name: description
description.title: Description
description.description: A free text description of the location.
description.example: MyCity Civic Center is located on Main Street and contains facilities for a number of civic and community services available.

transportation.name: transportation
transportation.title: Transportation
transportation.description: A free text description of the access to public or private transportation to and from the location.
transportation.example: MyCity Civic Center is serviced by the number 1 Bus and is a short walk from the Main Street Metro Station

latitude.name: latitude
latitude.title: Latitude
latitude.description: The latitude of the location expressed in decimal degrees in WGS84 datum.

longitude.name: longitude
longitude.title: Longitude
longitude.description: The longitude of the location expressed in decimal degrees in WGS84 datum.

external_identifier.name: external_identifier
external_identifier.title: External Identifier
external_identifier.description: A third party identifier for the location, which can be drawn from other services e.g. UK UPRN.

external_identifier_type.name: external_identifier_type
external_identifier_type.title: External Identifier Type
external_identifier_type.description: The scheme used for the location's external_identifier e.g. UK UPRN.

languages.name: languages
languages.title: Languages
languages.description: The languages that are spoken at locations or services. This does not include languages which can only be used with interpretation.

addresses.name: addresses
addresses.title: Addresses
addresses.description: The addresses of locations where organizations operate.

contacts.name: contacts
contacts.title: Contacts
contacts.description: The details of the named contacts for services and organizations. Note that in the HSDS data package format, if an individual is the contact for multiple services, their details may be duplicated multiple times in this table, each time with a new identifier, and with the rows containing different service ids.

accessibility.name: accessibility
accessibility.title: Accessibility
accessibility.description: The details of the arrangements for access to locations for people who have disabilities

phones.name: phones
phones.title: Phones
phones.description: The details of the telephone numbers used to contact organizations, services, and locations.

schedules.name: schedules
schedules.title: Schedules
schedules.description: The details of when a service or location is open. Entries are RFC 5545 RRULES.

attributes.name: attributes
attributes.title: Attributes
attributes.description: A link between a service and one or more classifications that describe the nature of the service provided.

metadata.name: metadata
metadata.title: Metadata
metadata.description: The metadata table contains a record of the changes that have been made to the data in order to maintain provenance information.
